name: Don't Duck With Me
description:
Stephen Squaking is a legendary duck scientist, thrown to the pond by humanity after developing the world's most advanced drilling device. Now, the humans are on a crash-course to ripping the Earth to shreds.

You, as Squaking, must race to the centre of the Earth, collecting precious resources along the way, whilst outrunning your own creations as the drills push you deeper and deeper (lol), to exact your revenge on human kind, and save the planet from destruction.
